Pre-Game Insights: Gautam Gambhir’s big vision for the team indicates that he wants more all-rounders and the batters to roll their arms over.
Post-Match Reflections: The big concern for the coaching staff will be that the team did not get much headway in answering the question about the third seamer.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The conditions in the one-dayers were on the extreme side, considering how spin-friendly the surfaces were, and batting got progressively tricky as the game went by.
Others: Washington Sundar and Riyan Parag’s bowling were the big positives.
Dube got a sustained run in this series to see if he could be an effective back-up for Hardik.
Rishabh Pant’s return to the one-day set-up in the final game came two years after his life-threatening accident but lasted only nine deliveries.
